channel.title: Stuff doesn't change
channel.description:
ok i compile my 508 server here is what it says after i compile [code=abap]javac: file not found: *java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options finished! press any key to continue...[/code]
my compiler code is [code=abap]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause[/code]

item.title: Stuff doesn't change
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Wronng section, any complier questions outside the thread shall be locked, stated inside it.
Can you not see the thread called this in big letters? “ALL COMPLIER REALATED QUESTIONS GO HERE!”

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff doesn't change
item.dc:creator: @youdunce2 youdunce2
item.description:
@youdunce2 wrote:

ok i compile my 508 server here is what it says after i compile javac: file not found: *java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options finished! press any key to continue...

my compiler code is @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause
